element.name: Code
element.desc: Identifies the specific accommodation. At least one required if the repeating group is sent.

element.name: SpecialMaterials
element.desc: Accommodation specified requires special materials. Required if the repeating group is sent.

value.name: MANUALLY_CODED_ENGLISH
value.desc: Manually coded English or American sign Language to present test questions

value.name: FOREIGN_LANGUAGE_QUESTIONS
value.desc: Foreign language interpreter for instructions, ask questions

value.name: FONT_ENLARGED_BEYOND_LARGE
value.desc: Font enlarged beyond large print version requirements

value.name: BRAILLE_WRITER_NO_THESAURUS
value.desc: Braille writer, no thesaurus, spell-or grammar-checker

value.name: QUALIFIED_FOREIGN_LANGUAGE
value.desc: Qualified foreign language interpreter for LEP student

value.name: RESPONSE_DICTATED_IN_AMERICAN
value.desc: Response dictated in American Sign Language / Manually coded English

value.name: TEST_ADMINISTRATOR_MARKED
value.desc: Test administrator marked / wrote test at student's direction due to student handwriting issues

value.name: WORD_PROCESSOR_NO_GRAMMER
value.desc: Word processor / typewriter / computer with thesaurus / spell-checker / grammar-checker turned off

value.name: WORD_PROCESSOR_GRAMMER
value.desc: Word processor / typewriter / computer with thesaurus / spell-checker / grammar-checker enabled on essay responses writing portion of test

value.name: ASSISTIVE_DOES_NOT
value.desc: Assistive device that does not interfere with independent work of the student

value.name: ASSISTIVE_DOES
value.desc: Assistive device that does interfere with independent work of the student

value.name: ESSAY_RESPONSES_DICTATED
value.desc: Essay responses dictated to a scribe orally, in manually coded English or in American Sign Language; and scribe provides spelling, grammar and language conventions

value.name: ACCESS_TO_TRANSLATION
value.desc: Access to translation glossaries / word lists (english-to-primary language). Shall not include definitions of formulas

value.name: TEST_ADMINISTERED_AT_BEST
value.desc: Test administered at best time of day for student

value.name: ADDITIONAL_SUPERVISED_TEST
value.desc: Additional supervised test breaks for English Learners within testing day or following each section provided that test section is completed within a testing day

value.name: SEPARATE_ROOM_WITH_OTHER
value.desc: Separate room with other English Learners under supervision of district employee

attribute.name: UnitOfMeasure
attribute.desc: Identifies unit of measure in which amount of time is expressed.

attribute.name: UnitOfMeasure
attribute.desc: Identifies unit of measure in which amount of time is expressed.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Category represents the optimal educational setting in which the student should be placed (setting where child has most desirable learning environment). Relates specifically to special education.

element.name: Code
element.desc: A reason why the Part C transition meeting was not held.

element.name: Code
element.desc: An outcome of a Part C transition meeting.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Describes the availability of the program.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Review by program / state. May be required if student has exited the program.

value.name: COMPLETION_OF_IFSP
value.desc: Completion of IFSP prior to reaching maximum age for Part C

value.name: GRADUATED_WITH_DIPLOMA
value.desc: Graduated with a high school diploma

value.name: NOT_ELIGIBLE_FOR_PART_B
value.desc: Not eligible for Part B, exit with referrals to other programs

value.name: RECEIVED_CERTIFICATE
value.desc: Received certificate of completion, modified diploma, or finished IEP requirements

value.name: TRANSFERRED_NOT_CONTINUING
value.desc: Transferred to another district or school, known not to be continuing in program / service

value.name: TRANSFERRED_CONTINUING
value.desc: Transferred to another district or school, known to be continuing in program / service

value.name: TRANSFERRED_NOT_KNOWN
value.desc: Transferred to another district or school, not known to be continuing in program / service

element.name: Code
element.desc: The document that outlines the student program/plan as approved by parents, guardians, and staff.

value.name: GIEP_INDIVIDUALIZED
value.desc: GIEP - Individualized education program for gifted student

element.name: Code
element.desc: The method by which a student was identified for referral to a particular program.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Setting where service is provided (Regular Class, Resource Room, Homebound, Detention Center, etc.).

value.name: REGULAR_NURSERY_SCHOOL
value.desc: Regular nursery school / child care center

value.name: REGULAR_SCHOOL_CAMPUS
value.desc: Regular school campus / regular class placement

value.name: HEAD_START_CENTER
value.desc: Head Start Center (no matter where offered)

value.name: FACILITY_OTHER
value.desc: A center in a facility other than a public or private school, a day care or children's facility, or other public programs such as Head Start

value.name: FACILITY_STATE
value.desc: facility sponsored by a state agency

value.name: SPECIAL_EDU_CHILDCARE
value.desc: Special education classroom im child care facility

value.name: SPECIAL_EDU_BUILDING
value.desc: Special education classroom in regular school building

value.name: SPECIAL_EDU_PORTABLE
value.desc: Special education classroom in trailers or portables outside regular school buildings

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: This is the unique identification code

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the student that this object is linked to.

element.name: StudentParticipationAsOfDate
element.desc: Effective date (NOT the entry date) of this StudentParticipation instance for the identified student and program. Each time there is a change to the student's program participation profile, a new instance of this object is to be generated with the appropriate StudentParticipationAsOfDate and a new RefId.

element.name: PartCTransitionMeetingDate
element.desc: Date the transition meeting was held for a Part C child.

element.name: ReferralDate
element.desc: Date student was referred for evaluation/program participation.

element.name: GiftedEligibilityCriteria
element.desc: State / local code used to determine eligibility for Gifted / Talented program.

element.name: EvaluationParentalConsentDate
element.desc: Date parent(s) consented to completion of evaluation of child for program participation.

element.name: EvaluationDate
element.desc: Date the evaluation/assessment process for student was completed.

element.name: EvaluationExtensionDate
element.desc: Actual date by which evaluation must be completed (for state use in determining timeliness in event that parent and LEA agreed to an extension beyond normal state deadline).

element.name: ExtensionComments
element.desc: Contains any comments on the extension. Optional even if an EvaluationExtensionDate is present.

element.name: ReevaluationDate
element.desc: Date students will be reevaluated for continued placement in a support program(s).

element.name: ProgramEligibilityDate
element.desc: Date student is eligible for beginning the support program(s).

element.name: ProgramPlanDate
element.desc: Date the most recent program plan was completed and approved by the team responsible for developing it. The date the parent consented to placement is NOREPDate.

element.name: ProgramPlanEffectiveDate
element.desc: Date by which the plan must be implemented for the student.

element.name: NOREPDate
element.desc: Date the Notice of Recommended Educational Placement was signed and approved by the parent / guardian of the student.

element.name: PlacementParentalConsentDate
element.desc: Date the parent(s) consented to the proposed placement.

element.name: ProgramPlacementDate
element.desc: Date student began the support program.

element.name: ExtendedSchoolYear
element.desc: For special education, indicates whether Extended School Year (ESY) / summer services have been determined as necessary

element.name: ExtendedDay
element.desc: For special education, indicates whether Extended School Day (ESD) services have been determined as necessary.

element.name: PrivateNotPlacedByPublic
element.desc: Indicates whether the student is enrolled by a parent/guardian in a private school and has special education/services provided at public expense. Necessary for the OSEP federal IDEA reports..

element.name: ProgramReviewDate
element.desc: Projected date of the program plan review (for IDEA, the projected annual IEP review date).

element.name: FBADate
element.desc: The most recent date on which the IEP Team completed a full and comprehensive review of all functional behavioral assessment materials.

element.name: BIPDate
element.desc: The most recent date on which the IEP Team approved a behavioral intervention plan.

element.name: ProgramExitDate
element.desc: Date student exited support program(s).

element.name: ProjectedExitDate
element.desc: The date on which it is projected that a student will exit program. Has typically been provided when student turns 14; under new IDEA, may change to 16.

element.name: ProjectedExitReason
element.desc: Review by program / state. May be required if a ProjectedExitDate is present. The projected reason for a student's exit from program.

element.name: PlannedAssessmentParticipation
element.desc: The student's planned level of participation in statewide assessments.

element.name: TransitionPlanning
element.desc: Purpose / goal for recommended transition planning services.

element.name: StudentSpecialEducationFTE
element.desc: Calculated ratio of time the student is in a special ed setting. Values range from 0.00 to 1.00. If the student is in a special ed setting 25% of the time, the value is .25; if 100% of the time, the value is 1.00.

element.name: EntryPerson
element.desc: Identification / name of the person who created the transaction that led to the creation of this instance of the object.

element.name: ParticipationContact
element.desc: Primary contact for this record.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: This is the unique identification code

attribute.name: StudentParticipationRefId
attribute.desc: This is the reference code for student eligibility for participation

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the student that this object is linked to.

element.name: StudentPlacementAsOfDate
element.desc: Effective date (NOT the entry date) of this StudentParticipation instance for the identified student and program. It is intended that each time the contents of this instance of the object changes, it will be published with a new RefId.

element.name: ServiceCategory
element.desc: Category of service (for example, whether it is instruction or a related / transitional service or a supplemental service). Typically designated by a state.

element.name: AgencyType
element.desc: Identifies an agency or clinic that will provide the specified service.

element.name: ServiceProviderName
element.desc: The name of the person who delivers the service.

element.name: LatestStartDate
element.desc: Date by which service is supposed to start for this student.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Actual date this service began for this student.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Actual date this service ended for this student.

element.name: DirectTime
element.desc: Number of units of time per session spent directly providing the service to the student.

element.name: IndirectTime
element.desc: Number of units of time per session NOT spent directly providing the service to the student but rather spent providing consultation services to someone related to the student (e.g. parent, a general ed teacher, a new service provider, etc.).

element.name: TotalServiceDuration
element.desc: Total of the direct and indirect time as it relates to the FrequencyTime; e.g., DirectTime 60 + IndirectTime 30 = 90.

element.name: IncludedInSpecialEducationFTE
element.desc: Indicates whether the direct time for this service is included in the calculation of a student's special education FTE.

element.name: SpecialNeedsTransportation
element.desc: Indicates whether the student requires transportation to the location of Placement/Service.

element.name: AssistiveTechnology
element.desc: Indicates whether the student requires assistive technology for this Placement/Service.

element.name: EntryPerson
element.desc: Identification / name of the person who created the transaction that led to the creation of this instance of the object.

element.name: StudentParticipationRefId
element.desc: Reference to the instance of the StudentParticipation object in which the required test accommodation(s) are specified for the date of the test.

element.name: Code
element.desc: The value specified in the referenced StudentParticipation object in ProgramType

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: Unique ID for this set of test accommodations required for a particular student who is participating in a special program and for whom this set of test accommodation(s) is recommended / prescribed for this test administration (specific subject area and level) in a specific special programs plan.

element.name: StudentPersonalRefId
element.desc: Reference to StudentPersonal object. Typically a vendor is allowed to receive a StatePrId or a StudentName, but not both together. The student must be identified by StudentPersonalRefId, or StudentName and LocalId, or StateStudentId.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The student's name as presented in StudentPersonal object, Name element with a Type of 02 (Current Legal Name). If Type 02 is not available, Type of 04 (Name of Record)

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally assigned identifier for this student.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: Reference to the state code identifying the student in the StudentPersonal object, as of the date of the response.

element.name: StateDistrictId
element.desc: Reference to State code (StatePrId for LEAInfo) for the student's district of enrollment as of the date of the response (optional because school might be independent).

element.name: LEAInfoRefId
element.desc: The RefId for the district to which the student's home school of enrollment belongs as of the date of the response (optional because school might be independent).

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: The RefId for the student's home school of enrollment as of the date of the response.

element.name: StateSchoolId
element.desc: Reference to State code (StatePrId for SchoolInfo) for student's home school of enrollment as of the date of the response (optional because state may not require).

element.name: GradeLevel
element.desc: Code for the current actual grade placement of the student as of the date of the response from StudentSchoolEnrollment.

element.name: AssessmentRegistrationRefId
element.desc: RefId for the student's registration / assignment to take a particular test (test name, subject area, level, grade level, type) at a particular time or within a particular timeframe. An assessment may also be identified by omitting this element and specifying the whole set (TestAdministration, TestSubjectArea, TestGradeLevel, TestAdministrationDateRange or PlannedTestAdministrationDate, and TestType).

element.name: TestAdministration
element.desc: Abbreviated name of the test for which this set of accommodations is to be provided.

element.name: TestSubjectArea
element.desc: Subject area of the test. Teachers may only supply this element, while a high-stakes test will supply the whole set (TestAdministration, TestSubjectArea, TestGradeLevel, TestAdministrationDateRange or PlannedTestAdministrationDate, and TestType).

element.name: TestGradeLevel
element.desc: Grade level of the test.

element.name: TestAdministrationDateRange
element.desc: General date range of the test (e.g. "Spring 2005"). Date is identified by either TestAdministrationDateRange or PlannedTestAdministrationDate

element.name: PlannedTestAdministrationDate
element.desc: The date the test is planned to be administered. Should contain the most current known date (Date is needed in order to identify accommodations to be sent -- accommodations are date-dependent).

element.name: TestType
element.desc: Identifies whether the test the student is to take is a standard or alternate.

element.name: AuthorizedActual
element.desc: Indicator - Identifies whether accommodations in this object are authorized or were actually used.

element.name: ActualTestAdministrationDate
element.desc: The date the test was actually administered.

attribute.name: UnitOfMeasure
attribute.desc: Identifies unit of measure in which amount of time is expressed.

attribute.name: UnitOfMeasure
attribute.desc: Identifies unit of measure in which amount of time is expressed.

element.name: Code
element.desc: General timing of service delivery relative to school calendar / schedule.
